HomeAboutWork

Work

Samples of work involving product strategy, information architecture (IA), wireframing, user interface design (UI), identity, and graphic design.

Map of the Internet

Devmonitor.io

UX/UI,VisualDesign,Front-end

At Steamclock Software, I worked on the design for Devmonitor.io – a website for developer evangelists to connect with their community. The web app enables a ‘devangelist’ to track questions about their product from sites like Stackoverflow.com.

ECUAD 2013 Catalog App

UI/UX,Web,Front-end,iPad

At Steamclock, I worked on the 2013 Emily Carr Graduation Exhibition website and iPad app. Students can submit via a web form. Curators can review submissions and approve projects or request resubmission. The Show brand by Seven25 Design.

Inspiral Magazine

Making Conversation

Podcast,Indentity,Community

Shawn Choi and I host the Making Conversation Podcast. We feature conversations with artists and designers about the journey from bright eyed-newbie to fame monster.

Woo To See You Identity

Know Ideas

Bravado Magazine

UI/UX,Front-end,CustomWordPress

I redesigned Bravado Magazine. The design of the website involved concept development, paper-prototyping, front-end development, and migration of content to WordPress. Bravado Magazine is, “high gloss pixels”.

ECUAD Catalog Website
